skills.title: Full Stack
skills.description: Full-stack developer with expertise in front-end technologies (React, Angular), back-end development (Node.js, C#), and database management (SQL, NoSQL), dedicated to delivering high-quality, user-centric web applications.

skills.title: Embedded System
skills.description: Embedded systems engineer with expertise in designing and optimizing hardware and software solutions, proficient in microcontroller programming (Arduino, Raspberry Pi), sensor integration, and real-time operating systems, committed to developing efficient and innovative embedded solutions for diverse applications.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Webflow developer with expertise in creating responsive and visually appealing websites, proficient in web design principles, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, dedicated to delivering high-quality and engaging web experiences for clients.

portfolio.title: IoT Home Automation using Cloud Computing
portfolio.description: A web app for a cloud-based home automation system operable from 190 countries. Utilized Google Firebase, Arduino, Node MCU, and sensors for efficiency. Achieved 79% accuracy and 50% more efficiency than previous products.

portfolio.title: Supply Chain Tracking Project (Blockchain & .NET)
portfolio.description: A .NET-based blockchain supply chain system, utilizing decentralized architecture and smart contracts for transparency and data integrity. Integrated IoT devices for regulatory compliance, achieving a 30% boost in efficiency.

portfolio.title: Food Ordering and Fees Payment System for Colleges
portfolio.description: A comprehensive college application with features including an online notice board, canteen ordering, and fee payment system. Utilized Express JS, Node JS, and React JS, integrating payment APIs like PayPal and Google Pay for a comprehensive solution.

portfolio.title: Used and New Car Website for Askey Auto(FreeLancing)
portfolio.description: Developed a dynamic website for Askey Auto, facilitating the buying and selling of both new and used cars. The website incorporated modern web technologies, including Node.js, React.js, Firebase, HTML, and CSS, to ensure a seamless user experience.

portfolio.title: Medicare Shopping System - Flask
portfolio.description: Developed a Medicare Shopping System using Flask, HTML, and CSS to provide users with a seamless experience in browsing and selecting Medicare products like medicine. The system leveraged Flask's lightweight and efficient framework to handle user requests and responses.

portfolio.title: Uncovering the Factors that Drive Airbnb Bookings and Revenue
portfolio.description: A portfolio which analyze NYC Airbnb data, predicting bookings and revenue. Conducted demand, price, and geospatial analyses. Developed fraud detection algorithms. Grouped owners based on pet, smoking, and party policies

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
bulletPoints: Acquired expertise in web technologies including HTML, Angular, React, CSS, PHP, Webflow, JavaScript and Azure complemented by practical experience in using Adobe Creative Cloud software.

Collaborated closely with CEO and cross-functional team to spearhead design, development, and enhancement of ScholarshipAuditions.com, resulting in a significant increase in website traffic and a notable boost in user engagement throug optimized graphics and UI/UX improvements

experience.title: Embedded System Engineer Intern
bulletPoints: Pioneered a team of four in designing and implementing energy-efficient thermostat systems, consolidating Raspberry Pi 0 modules, fan chips, QT framework and various components to develop smart thermostat solutions

Optimized thermostat algorithms and hardware configurations, resulting in substantial energy savings and reduced utility costs for customers by 25% annually through optimized mobile app functionality.

experience.title: Web Developer
bulletPoints: Spearheaded development of a comprehensive website for healthcare professionals, leveraging JavaScript, Node.js, React, Django, and Spring Boot. Administered a robust and user-friendly interface to boost digital presence of doctors.

Engaged cross-functional teams to seamlessly integrate technologies, yielding a dynamic website tailored to the specific needs of medical practitioners. Deployed advanced functionalities for streamlined appointments, patient information management, and enhanced communication channels utilizing a diverse tech stack.

experience.title: Web Designer
bulletPoints: Meet Various clients, understand their requirements, and then develop websites for them by using tools like Wix and godaddy for amplifying the looks of websites
Chaired and designed a new website for a doctor, while leading group of three and using React, JavaScript and angular at Bs Group internship

experience.title: Web Developer
bulletPoints: Maintenance and refining of existing websites to be replaced into new website.
Designing marketing posters and handling social media
